page.title: 14Housing
page.content: There is a mixture of housing in the village from the old to the very new.There are three listed buildings in the village;All Saints Church,Poplar Farm House and the Wheatsheaf Public House.We noticed the outside of the Wheatsheaf was being painted.The newest houses are on a small development and are two years and four months old.We found examples of terraced houses,semi_detached and detached houses and bungalows.These are mainly privately owned though there is some council property.One house for sale in the village was advertised in the local paper for Â£71500.There is no gas in the village so they have to use electricity for heating,cooking and lighting which comes into the houses from overhead wires.however some people use oil to heat their homes.
